longpressDuration.name: longpressDuration
longpressDuration.description[zh_CN]: 设置触摸屏长按的持续时间，单位为毫秒
longpressDuration.description: Set the duration for touchscreen longpress, the unit is ms

shortpressDuration.name: shortpressDuration
shortpressDuration.description[zh_CN]: 设置触摸屏短按的持续时间，单位为毫秒
shortpressDuration.description: Set the duration for touchscreen shortpress, the unit is ms

edgemovestopDuration.name: edgemovestopDuration
edgemovestopDuration.description[zh_CN]: 设置触摸屏边缘移动停止时间，单位为毫秒
edgemovestopDuration.description: Set the duration for touchscreen edge move stop time, the unit is ms

longpressBlacklist.name: longpressBlacklist
longpressBlacklist.description[zh_CN]: 设置禁用触摸屏长按的应用命令行列表
longpressBlacklist.description: Set app cmdline list for disable touchscreen longpress
